name: Hearts for Hearts (H4H)
briefDescription: H4H performs free cardiac surgery, follow-up and clinical research for impact and prevention in the less affluent. Surgeries are performed at Public Health Centre Hospital, Chennai. Multisource funding supports this project called 'Solution for the Cardiac Afflicted Needy' (SOCAN). Patients are either referred, come directly or are detected in camps. 290 surgeries have been conducted with children being the majority.  Detection to surgery and periodical follow up, are entirely free for the patients with an annual income below Rs. 72,000/-. Partnerships for rehabilitation are also on the anvil. Multisource global funding is responsible for the sustainability of this dynamic, holistic project.
